title.rendered: Diwali celebrations spread joy in Pathankot

content.rendered: Diwali celebrations were conducted with much joy and pomp at Mini Bright Future School at Khanpur, Pathankot. The school is a centre of education for mentally challenged students. The Principal of Delhi Public School, Jhakolehri, Pathankot was also present in the celebrations. The students decorated the venue with beautiful candles and diyas and had much fun during the celebrations.
